Package vrielynckpieterjan.masterproef.encryptionlayer.entities

Class EntityIdentifier<RSAKeyType extends java.security.Key,​IBEEncryptionKeyType>

java.lang.Object
vrielynckpieterjan.masterproef.encryptionlayer.entities.EntityIdentifier<RSAKeyType,​IBEEncryptionKeyType>
Type Parameters:
RSAKeyType - The subtype of the Key used to represent the RSA part of the identifier.
IBEEncryptionKeyType - The type used to represent the IBE part of the identifier.
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
PrivateEntityIdentifier, PublicEntityIdentifier
public abstract class EntityIdentifier<RSAKeyType extends java.security.Key,​IBEEncryptionKeyType>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Abstract class representing an entity identifier.

    • EntityIdentifier

      protected EntityIdentifier​(@NotNull RSAKeyType rsaIdentifier, @NotNull IBEEncryptionKeyType ibeIdentifier, @NotNull @NotNull java.lang.String namespaceServiceProviderEmailAddressUserConcatenation)
      Constructor for the EntityIdentifier class.
      Parameters:
      rsaIdentifier - The Key used to represent the RSA part of the identifier.
      ibeIdentifier - The IBE part of the identifier.
      namespaceServiceProviderEmailAddressUserConcatenation - A concatenation of the namespace and the e-mail address of the user. This value should not be hashed yet.

    • generateEntityIdentifierPair

      public static org.apache.commons.lang3.tuple.Pair<PrivateEntityIdentifier,​PublicEntityIdentifier> generateEntityIdentifierPair​(@NotNull @NotNull java.lang.String namespaceEmailAddressConcatenation)
      Static method to generate the combination of a PublicEntityIdentifier and its PrivateEntityIdentifier counterpart.
      Parameters:
      namespaceEmailAddressConcatenation - The concatenation of the namespace and the e-mail address of the user, which shouldn't be hashed yet. A hashed version (SHA-512) of this concatenation can be used as the StorageElementIdentifier to store the NamespaceAttestation of the generated user with in the StorageLayer.
      Returns:
      The combination as a Pair.
